```go
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := network.NewNetworkVirtualAppliance(ctx, "networkVirtualAppliance", &network.NetworkVirtualApplianceArgs{
			Delegation: &network.DelegationPropertiesArgs{
				ServiceName: pulumi.String("PaloAltoNetworks.Cloudngfw/firewalls"),
			},
			Location:                    pulumi.String("West US"),
			NetworkVirtualApplianceName: pulumi.String("nva"),
			ResourceGroupName:           pulumi.String("rg1"),
			Tags: pulumi.StringMap{

			},
			VirtualHub: &network.SubResourceArgs{
				Id: pulumi.String("/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualHubs/hub1"),
```

```csharp
var networkVirtualApplianceResource = new AzureNative.Network.NetworkVirtualAppliance("networkVirtualApplianceResource", new()
{
    ResourceGroupName = "string",
    Delegation = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.DelegationPropertiesArgs
    {
        ServiceName = "string",
    },
    NetworkVirtualApplianceName = "string",
    CloudInitConfigurationBlobs = new[]
    {
        "string",
    },
    AdditionalNics = new[]
    {
        new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicPropertiesArgs
        {
            HasPublicIp = false,
            Name = "string",
        },
    },
    Id = "string",
    Identity = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.ManagedServiceIdentityArgs
    {
        Type = AzureNative.Network.ResourceIdentityType.SystemAssigned,
        UserAssignedIdentities = new[]
        {
            "string",
        },
    },
    CloudInitConfiguration = "string",
    InternetIngressPublicIps = new[]
    {
        new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.InternetIngressPublicIpsPropertiesArgs
        {
            Id = "string",
        },
    },
    NetworkProfile = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.NetworkVirtualAppliancePropertiesFormatNetworkProfileArgs
    {
        NetworkInterfaceConfigurations = new[]
        {
            new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationArgs
            {
                NicType = "string",
                Properties = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationPropertiesArgs
                {
                    IpConfigurations = new[]
                    {
                        new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationArgs
                        {
                            Name = "string",
                            Properties = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationPropertiesArgs
                            {
                                Primary = false,
                            },
                        },
                    },
                },
            },
        },
    },
    Location = "string",
    NvaSku = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.VirtualApplianceSkuPropertiesArgs
    {
        BundledScaleUnit = "string",
        MarketPlaceVersion = "string",
        Vendor = "string",
    },
    BootStrapConfigurationBlobs = new[]
    {
        "string",
    },
    SshPublicKey = "string",
    Tags = 
    {
        { "string", "string" },
    },
    VirtualApplianceAsn = 0,
    VirtualHub = new AzureNative.Network.Inputs.SubResourceArgs
    {
        Id = "string",
    },
});
```

```go
example, err := network.NewNetworkVirtualAppliance(ctx, "networkVirtualApplianceResource", &network.NetworkVirtualApplianceArgs{
	ResourceGroupName: pulumi.String("string"),
	Delegation: &network.DelegationPropertiesArgs{
		ServiceName: pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	NetworkVirtualApplianceName: pulumi.String("string"),
	CloudInitConfigurationBlobs: pulumi.StringArray{
		pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	AdditionalNics: network.VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicPropertiesArray{
		&network.VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicPropertiesArgs{
			HasPublicIp: pulumi.Bool(false),
			Name:        pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	Id: pulumi.String("string"),
	Identity: &network.ManagedServiceIdentityArgs{
		Type: network.ResourceIdentityTypeSystemAssigned,
		UserAssignedIdentities: pulumi.StringArray{
			pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	CloudInitConfiguration: pulumi.String("string"),
	InternetIngressPublicIps: network.InternetIngressPublicIpsPropertiesArray{
		&network.InternetIngressPublicIpsPropertiesArgs{
			Id: pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
	NetworkProfile: &network.NetworkVirtualAppliancePropertiesFormatNetworkProfileArgs{
		NetworkInterfaceConfigurations: network.VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationArray{
			&network.VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationArgs{
				NicType: pulumi.String("string"),
				Properties: &network.VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationPropertiesArgs{
					IpConfigurations: network.VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationArray{
						&network.VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationArgs{
							Name: pulumi.String("string"),
							Properties: &network.VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationPropertiesArgs{
								Primary: pulumi.Bool(false),
							},
						},
					},
				},
			},
		},
	},
	Location: pulumi.String("string"),
	NvaSku: &network.VirtualApplianceSkuPropertiesArgs{
		BundledScaleUnit:   pulumi.String("string"),
		MarketPlaceVersion: pulumi.String("string"),
		Vendor:             pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	BootStrapConfigurationBlobs: pulumi.StringArray{
		pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	SshPublicKey: pulumi.String("string"),
	Tags: pulumi.StringMap{
		"string": pulumi.String("string"),
	},
	VirtualApplianceAsn: pulumi.Float64(0),
	VirtualHub: &network.SubResourceArgs{
		Id: pulumi.String("string"),
	},
})
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

```java
var networkVirtualApplianceResource = new NetworkVirtualAppliance("networkVirtualApplianceResource", NetworkVirtualApplianceArgs.builder()
    .resourceGroupName("string")
    .delegation(DelegationPropertiesArgs.builder()
        .serviceName("string")
        .build())
    .networkVirtualApplianceName("string")
    .cloudInitConfigurationBlobs("string")
    .additionalNics(VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicPropertiesArgs.builder()
        .hasPublicIp(false)
        .name("string")
        .build())
    .id("string")
    .identity(ManagedServiceIdentityArgs.builder()
        .type("SystemAssigned")
        .userAssignedIdentities("string")
        .build())
    .cloudInitConfiguration("string")
    .internetIngressPublicIps(InternetIngressPublicIpsPropertiesArgs.builder()
        .id("string")
        .build())
    .networkProfile(NetworkVirtualAppliancePropertiesFormatNetworkProfileArgs.builder()
        .networkInterfaceConfigurations(VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationArgs.builder()
            .nicType("string")
            .properties(VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigurationPropertiesArgs.builder()
                .ipConfigurations(VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationArgs.builder()
                    .name("string")
                    .properties(VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationPropertiesArgs.builder()
                        .primary(false)
                        .build())
                    .build())
                .build())
            .build())
        .build())
    .location("string")
    .nvaSku(VirtualApplianceSkuPropertiesArgs.builder()
        .bundledScaleUnit("string")
        .marketPlaceVersion("string")
        .vendor("string")
        .build())
    .bootStrapConfigurationBlobs("string")
    .sshPublicKey("string")
    .tags(Map.of("string", "string"))
    .virtualApplianceAsn(0)
    .virtualHub(SubResourceArgs.builder()
        .id("string")
        .build())
    .build());
```

<h4 id="subresource">
Sub<wbr>Resource<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python,go" class="inline">, Sub<wbr>Resource<wbr>Args</pulumi-choosable>
</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="id_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#id_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Sub-resource ID. Both absolute resource ID and a relative resource ID are accepted.
An absolute ID starts with /subscriptions/ and contains the entire ID of the parent resource and the ID of the sub-resource in the end.
A relative ID replaces the ID of the parent resource with a token '$self', followed by the sub-resource ID itself.
Example of a relative ID: $self/frontEndConfigurations/my-frontend.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:network:NetworkVirtualAppliance nva /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkVirtualAppliances/{networkVirtualApplianceName} 
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
